body: This is the kind of story I search endlessly for, and would spend any amount of money on. It requires thought, thinking with the large head and not the small. I was a bit confused by the flashback at first, until I figured out it was the same girl at an earlier time when she had long hair. Discovering how she came to be the woman who wanted to "just play", and how much she was broken and hurting inside… luckily, she found a guy who fell in love with her, and didn't want to just play.
